favourite.article: The real Christian life is a life not of struggling and of self effort. The Christian life is "not I but Christ."
I really love the song (verse Gal. 2:20). this life offers us so many choices but for me to choose well, I have to know the will of God, because it is not about me any more, it is about about Him.

This song reminds us that we are not our own. We should live another kind of Life. When we are living this kind of Life we are living the most noble,highest form of Living. Hallelujah it's no longer I who lives but it is Christ in Me...
I like this song. Christ is my life. I love You, Lord.
To experience more of Christ being crucified through a song.
